sentence:
• Shares of Darden Restaurants, Inc. ( DRI ) rose 0.6% after reporting fiscal first quarter adjusted earnings of $0.88 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.83
• Salesforce.com, Inc's ( CRM ) shares increased 3% on news that the company is continuing its M&A activity with a $700 million takeover of marketing-data and artificial intelligence company Krux Digital
• Shares of Alphabet Inc. ( GOOGL ) advanced 0.3% following news that the company launched new smartphones, named Pixel and Pixel XL
• Shares of Costamare Inc. ( CMRE ) slumped 19% after the company reduced its dividend to $0.10 per share from $0.29 per share
